tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_type VARCHAR(255),
    generation_date DATE,
    disposal_method VARCHAR(255),
    disposal_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_generation (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name TEXT,
  waste_type TEXT,
  quantity INT,
  generation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_disposal (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name TEXT,
  waste_type TEXT,
  disposal_method TEXT,
  disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_generators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    industry_type VARCHAR(100),
    waste_generation_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    generator_id INT,
    site_id INT,
    amount_collected DECIMAL,
    collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_id INT,
  disposal_facility_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_quantity DECIMAL
);
